# gt_theme_nytimes { #gt_extras.gt_theme_nytimes }

```python
gt_theme_nytimes(gt)
```

Applies a New York Times-inspired theme to a GT table.

This function styles a `GT` object with a look inspired by New York Times tables.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type   | Description              | Default    |
|--------|--------|--------------------------|------------|
| gt     | GT     | An existing `GT` object. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                                           |
|--------|--------|-------------------------------------------------------|
|        | GT     | The themed `GT` object, allowing for method chaining. |
